title: Adeles son doesnt like her music
text:
Adele's son doesn't like her music 
Irish Examiner Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Adele's son doesn't like her music. The 27-year-old singer has admitted she loves to sing to her three-year-old son Angelo, whom she has with her longtime partner Simon Konecki, but she's restricted to popular nursery rhymes because he's not a fan of her tracks.Asked if she regularly sings to her child, she said on BBC Radio 2's 'Chris Evans' Breakfast Show': "Yeah I do. He doesn't really like my music. So I sing 'Twinkle, Twinkle,''Row, Row, Row Your Boat,''Peppa Pig.'"...
